document.full_text: the obama administration has asked a judge in arizona to dismiss a lawsuit by the state that argues that the federal government has fallen down on the job securing the border with mexico.
document.title: u.s. wants arizona suit over border security tossed
lines_and_colors: the obama administration has asked a judge in arizona to dismiss a lawsuit by the state that argues that the federal government has fallen down on the job securing the border with mexico.
